definition[0]: using money, time, goods etc carefully and without wasting any
example[0]: A small car is more economical to run.
definition[1]: using time, money, goods etc carefully and without wasting any
example[2]: Adults generally watch a movie on video once or twice, making it more economical to rent than buy.
example[3]: Environmentalists insist that polystyrene recycling can be economical.
